articles.description: A fleet of ball-shaped rovers could drift across the Martian surface like tumbleweed, driven simply by the wind.
articles.content: Wind speeds on Mars are high enough to blow fleets of large spherical rovers that resemble tumbleweed across the Red Planet's surface, according to new wind-tunnel tests of small prototypes conducted… [+4648 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: See Two Comets Share October Night Sky With Fireball Swarm - Forbes
articles.description: Comets Lemmon and SWAN R2 will be visible during October 2025 during the Orionid and Taurid meteor showers, creating a month of comets, "shooting stars" and fireballs.
articles.content: Comet Lemmon will be visible during October 2025 during the Orionid and Taurid meteor showers, creating a month of potential comets, "shooting stars" and fireballs. (2024's Comet 12P/Pons-Brooks is p… [+3095 chars]

articles.title: Israeli scientists unveil bold method to detect dark matter - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Dark matter is a type of matter that does not emit, absorb, or reflect light, making it invisible to telescopes.
